    • Method Detail

      • lookupAnnotatedElements

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.reflect.Field,​java.util.List<A>> lookupAnnotatedElements​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Description copied from class: AbstractAnnotationBasedExtension
        Overriding methods need to return a map, where the key is the annotated element (e.g. field, method) and the value is a list of (potentially repeatable) annotations. In case the annotation is not repeatable, than e list with size 1 is returned, containing the single annotation.
        Specified by:
        lookupAnnotatedElements in class AbstractAnnotationBasedExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​java.lang.reflect.Field>
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to lookup annotations for
        Returns:
        the map of annotated elements and their corresponding annotations (potentially repeatable)
